description: This Python source file provides functions for managing environment variable mappings between common and framework-specific formats, including parsing YAML templates, applying prefixes, and retrieving supported frameworks.

methods.name: get_template_path
methods.description: Returns the Path to the environment template file for a specified framework.

methods.name: parse_template_file
methods.description: Parses a YAML template file to extract an optional prefix and a mapping dictionary.

methods.name: apply_prefix_mapping
methods.description: Applies a prefix to all environment variables in a given dictionary.

methods.name: map_common_to_framework
methods.description: Maps common environment variables to framework-specific variables based on a template.

methods.name: map_framework_to_common
methods.description: Maps framework-specific environment variables back to common variables.

methods.name: get_supported_frameworks
methods.description: Returns a list of frameworks supported based on existing template directories.
